11122.content:
It was another late night at Wilko for John, who had to stay late cleaning the Men’s restroom due to a customer throwing up all over a urinal and sink because of some bad sushi they ate before they got to the store. Better yet, it all occurred 5 minutes before the closing shift ended.

Go figure!

It was tough and grimy work that John had to do, but he enjoyed it. The instant satisfaction/gratification you get after seeing something you’ve cleaned/fixed was always a rewarding feeling to him. Plus, he liked the people he saw everyday, as they always treated with fairly so he did the same.

“And that should take care of that” he said as he finished mopping the last of the puke off the floor.

He wiped the sweat from his brow, and checked his watch.

12:45 a.m.

Normally he’d take the day shift, just so that his wife wouldn’t worry about him coming home so late, but he switched shifts with one of the younger guys who had a date tonight.

“Whelp, I’d better be getting back to Amanda, she’s probably still up waiting for me”

He wringed the mop in the bucket, when he noticed a smudge on one of the tiles on the wall.

“The poor bastard went full exorcist on this bathroom, he even hit the walls” John chuckled to himself, pulling a rag from his back pocket to scrub it.

At first, he lightly scrubbed it because it appeared not to be too dry or bonded with with the tile.

That failed, so he exerted a bit more force to get this tough stain out of the tile.

“What in the hell?” John said, being frustrated by this stubborn stain on the wall.

John put all his weight behind his hand and scrubbed his hardest against the stain, when suddenly, the tile clicked and retracted into the wall.

“Oops.”

From there, various clicking noises could be heard from behind the wall. John took a step toward the wall and put his ear up to it, just to confirm that he was in fact hearing these noises.

Just then, the wall split into two halves, and opened up into a dark room. John stumbled into the room as he was totally caught off guard, not knowing the wall was basically going to give out in him. He felt to his hands and knees, letting out an audible cry as he hadn’t taken a fall that hard since he was a teenager.

“Christ almighty” he said to himself, looking down at his before sitting upward and rubbing them together.

John looked up and seen that the room was pitch black, and all he could see was a pedestal, with what seemed to be a glowing orb hanging over it.

He couldn’t quite explain it, but he felt as if he was being called to the orb. To spring up onto his feet and race to embrace it. Despite this feeling, he slowly stood up, dusted himself off, and crept slowly toward the ball of light.

As he drew closer, he thought he could hear faint whispers coming from the direction of the orb, but discredited that due to his lack of belief in things of such matters.

Soon enough, John was right in front of the pedestal and the whispers grew louder. There were faintly engraved words on the pedestal, and they weren’t visible until John dusted them off with his hand.

“le....pouvoir.....de wilko? What the hell is that? French?” John thought out loud.

“Oui”

John looked up quickly to see the source of the reply, as now a hooded figure appeared on the other side of the pedestal.

The figure spoke broken English with a French accent, “John, as I have watched, your services you give Wilko are irreplaceable. Please, allow, me to offer this blessing, pour ton travail acharné”.

“What’re you talking about mate? Are you feeling funny?” John said, confused and a bit scared.

“Ah ah, Monsieur John. I am as you say, serious. Many service Wilko for generations, and this gift is for those of service” the figure said.

The orb then started to pulsate, and the whispers grew louder and louder in John’s ears.

Sweat drops began to form on John’s forehead, “What sort of gift?”.

The figure chuckled, as his voice deepened as he spoke. “The whispers you hear are from all. With this power, you are free to manipulate all and their vessels”.

Before John could question the figure, the orb produced a sublime and blinding light that caught him by surprise and forced John to cover his eyes. The orb then shot into John’s chest, rendering him breathless.

Just as he was about to pass out, he heard the figure whisper in his ear, “Manipulate the vessels of others as you please, or even your own for that matter. Farewell, fellow serviceman of Wilko”.

John later woke up:

111223.content:
Dun Dun Dun

A faint knocking noise caused John to open his eyes sluggishly, as if he was awaking from a deep sleep.

A voice then accompanied it, with both noises growing louder as he came to.

“John? Are you in there?” the familiar voice called out

“Huh? W-what, Uh, er yes! Come inside!” He sputtered out, still disoriented as to where he was or what was happening.

The source of the voice peeked their head in, and John looked up to see that it was the store manager, Emma.

Is everything alright John? I just wanted to check in to see if you were feeling okay. Some of the employees said that you seemed lackluster and “zombie-like” when you came in this morning” she explained.

John quickly focused in on the situation at hand, “Walked in? To here?”. He looked around to locate where he actually was. “Shit I’m in the office, but how did I-“

His train of thought was interrupted by Emma, “If you’re not feeling well or not in the mood for today, you can take it off John. I’ve had plenty of days where work just wasn’t in the stars, so I called in. Hell, I won’t even subtract one of your PTO’s!”

As he grew more coherent, John felt better and even started to look better than before. The color in his face was a bit flushed but now it had became visible again. However, he could not remember coming into work that morning, or even making it home after his shift last night for that matter.

“So just let me know in a bit how you’re feeling!” Emma said as she smiled a friendly smile at John, and headed out of his doorway.

“I’ll let you know in a bit Em. Thank you”.

Now that he was alone, he could really ponder on tracing his steps. Apparently he made it to work, in a different jumpsuit from yesterday which meant that he made it home and showered. But before that? He was drawing a blank.

He was cleaning the Men’s bathroom, and...

John’s eyes grew wide.

“That fuckin wall!” He said out loud, quickly rising from his desk and heading for the door.

——————————————-

John inspected the wall of the restroom just as he did the night before. He pushed against every tile he could, and none of them performed like last night.

“This is so crazy” he said to himself, exhaling as he put his hands on his hips. He stepped forward to the sink, and splashed his face with some cold water to really wake himself up and get the neurotransmitters firing.

John looked up at the mirror and let out a small shriek. In his mirror, was not his reflection, but that hooded figure that he had met the night before!

“What the hell? How’re you doin this?” John asked, unsure whether to be terrified or impressed.

“I am capable of incredible things Monsieur John.”

It was odd, even in the well light bathroom, John was unable to see the figures face. It was almost as if the hood itself was a black hole with a voice coming out of it.

“And so are you!”

“What was that? Me?” questioned John.

“Like I said last night, manipulate the vessels of others as you please, or even your own”

“Yeah but what does that even mean? You’re talking all this mumbo-jumbo and I don’t even understand any of it.”

The figure chuckled, “Oh John, you do humor me. If you see that somebody has something you want, you may swap it out for something you have. Or you see somebody needs something, you may gift them somebody else’s”.

“So like...presents?” John asked, still confused and a bit creeped out that he was talking into a mirror.

“Oh no no no Monsieur John. You have no hair, yes?”

John patted the top of his head, feeling his bald spot. “Yeah i guess”, he grumbled.

“This is true. But Michaęl has nice hair, oui?”

The thought of Michael and his neatly combed hair popped into John’s mind. It seemed so thick and well groomed at all times, that John couldn’t help but feel jealous in comparison to what he had.

“I guess he does, yeah”

“You may simply swap yours, for his. Just think about it, and it will be so.” the figure explained.

John looked back up at the mirror to retort the figures claim, but all he seen was his reflection. The figure was gone.

His eyes shot up to his scalp, one that was once full of nice long and healthy locks was not riddled to nothing but a wasteland of hair and scalp. He could feel a mixture of emotions building in his stomach as he thought about it, but the figures words rang through his mind.

“Ah what the hell, why not try what he’s sayin” John thought to himself.

He looked at his scalp, and thought about Michael’s well kept hair in its place.

Nothing initially happened, causing John to chuckle and turn away from the mirror, when something caught his eye.

Darks strands of hair started to slowly appear on his head, and soon enveloped his entire scalp. It then grew out and rested on his head, very similar to.....Michael’s haircut.

“Whoa what the fuck!” John said in disbelief, unable to process the change in front of his eyes. He rummaged his fingers through his hair to confirm what he was seeing, and it was true.

Somehow, someway, he had swapped Michael’s hair with his own.

He hadn’t had a full head of hair in years, and he wasn't quite sure how to react to it.

“Wait” he thought to himself, “that means Michael got my hair, shit”.

——————————————-

John walked through the aisles searching for Michael, to see what his reaction would be to seeing his hair on John’s head. He eventually found him showing a customer where the batteries were, and there it was.

John’s balding hair on full display on-top of Michael’s head.

Michael stepped away from the customer, and John approached him.

“Uh, hey Michael, how ya doin?”

“John what’s up! I was actually gonna ask Liz to radio you. Some kid dropped a carton on milk in the refrigerated section.”

“Oh, uh okay. I’ll jump right to that. I was actually gonna ask if you’d gotten a haircut recently” John asked, trying not to stare at his former hair follicles.

“Thanks, and no I haven’t. I’ve been trying to grow it out a bit taut I’ve just been losing so much hair lately that I might just go bald. I was hoping to have a full head of hair like yours in my forties but that’s just how genes work I guess” Michael answers, rubbing his hair.

John fought to not let his jaw drop. So apparently, when he made these changes, nobody but him would be aware of what occurred. He couldn’t help but laugh, but quickly swallow it to not appear odd in front of Michael.

“Well I just wanted to check in with you Mike, I’ll go mop that up right now”.

John walked away with a smile on his face, as his brain gradually thought of other improvements to his life he could make

What happened next?

1112233.content:
Questions and ideas poured into John’s mind as he headed toward the refrigerated area of the store, thinking of what he was now capable of with this new bestowed power. He knew that he could change his own life with it, but what about those around him? The figure did briefly mention about the “vessels of others” so did that mean he was free to change others as well? He needed to experiment, and see his power at work firsthand.

He scanned the aisles are he walked through the store, searching for two guinea pigs he could attempt to change. He soon stopped in his tracks when he caught two of his co-workers chatting while stocking shelves, and they couldn’t be any different.

It was Claire, and Allie. It was clear that Claire had been assisting Allie in stocking up the higher shelves, as Allie was too short to even reach them. Claire’s 5’10 frame really helped out around the store, and her co-workers as well. Allie was about 5’0, so you could definitely miss her sometimes when searching for somebody. Her height was somewhat of a disadvantage when working at a department store, but she made up for it for being a hard-worker with an enjoyable personality.

The two women were gossiping about some show that they both had interest in, and their opinions on what the next season may consist of. John knew nothing of the sort, although it sounded like something that his wife or daughter may be interested in.

John stepped back into the aisle adjacent to them, so that he was able to hear what they were saying, but not be seen.

“Yeah, that cliffhanger at the end really duped me! But the end credit scene sort of set up part of the next season!” Allie told Claire.

“End credit scene! I didn’t even know that was a thing! I’m so bad at just skipping over little things like that. Some fan I am” Claire sighed.

As the two of them continued to yak on about their interests, John focused in on what he could change about them. Suddenly, the inspiration hit him.

“Their legs! One's tall, and the other's small! I suppose I could try and flip em around.” John said to himself, half excitedly.

He took his feather duster out from his waistband, and entered the aisle that the two women were in. He used that to act like he was dusting some of the shelves, just to witness this change himself, if possible.

Upon seeing the custodian, Claire and Allie both greeted him and exchanged happy looks with him, before returning to their conversation.

John returned the favor, and begun to fake dust the shelves. He looked over at the two women, and said under his breath, “Here goes nothing”.

He envisioned Claire with Allie's stumpy legs and round butt, and Allie with Claire’s long, never ending legs and flat rear.

He didn’t notice anything immediately, but after a few glances back in their direction, he could see that the two of them were slowly meeting face to face without the knowledge of what was happening to them. Allie and Claire weren’t staring in his direction, so he begun to give his undivided attention to the transformation he set forth.

Claire’s pant legs were beginning to become baggy at her ankles, whereas Allie’s skinny jeans rose to about her mid-calf area. Given the exchange of legs/height, Allie now had to be at least 5’8, while Claire had shrunk down to being 5’1. Lastly, as he had a perfect view of Claire’s back, John could see the back of her pants filling up with Allie’s ample rear. Her slim trousers stretched outward as they tried to accommodate her new asset.

“Lord almighty what have I done” John thought to himself after witnessing his power at work.

He heard their conversation change somewhat, after he made the change, as Claire seemed a bit more grateful for Allie’s presence.

“I’m lucky you came around when you did Allie, I would’ve needed to grab a ladder from the back”.

“It’s all good! I put ‘reaching high places’ as one of my strengths on the application” Allie joked.

John turned away from the two of them and semi-sped walk out of the aisle, in disbelief at what he’d just done.

“So not only did I change their legs, I changed their minds too! Geez if I could get clothes to fit too it’d be perfect!” John said to himself.

He then felt a buzz on his waist, his walkie-talkie. It was:

He’d call out for different pieces and Liz would scramble trying to find them amongst the pulled piles she’d made, as she tried to remain useful during this task. John could’ve done it alone, but it was nice to have the company when doing something like this.

“So how’s Amanda and the kids? Brendon’s really sprouted since the last time Amanda brought them by the store” Liz asked.

Just as Liz was about to bring up another lame story about her kindergartener, John stood up and lifted the desk in its correct position.

“That should do it luv!” He said as he patted the desktop.

“Wow thank you so much John! I wouldn’t have been able to do this without you or your help! How can I repay you?”

When presented with that with that question , initially, some questionable thoughts definitely filled his mind but were cleared almost immediately when he realized who he was talking to. Two thoughts reminded, and he decided to act upon one of them.

"It's strange, most of our workers have been here for donkeys too. You think the average age would be creeping up. It's not our fault older people don't want to work retail. It can be physically demanding especially in a hardware store where a lot of the stock is quite heavy."

"I know Liz. I know the advantages of older employees too." She closed the e-mail software. "We don't have the budget for more employees right now. We don't even have that many Christmas temps to take on that other retailers do."

"There is training too. Most of our existing employees have been here so long they are worth two temps, who are only here for a few weeks and don't have time to learn all the jobs properly."

Emma found her imagination wandering off as she thought about the problem. "What we'd want is somehow to be able to swap the minds of our staff into older bodies. That would get the average age up."

"Or get older experienced people, into younger bodies. Surely mental age counts instead of physical age. Everyone keeps saying 'It's just a number' after all." Liz said with a grin.

Emma looked up to the ceiling. "I wish we could do all that." She brought her head back down again. "Oh well enough for fantasy land. Back to the grind." She opened up the Solitaire program on her computer.
134.title: Some other swapping ideas.

1341.content:
A few minutes later and Emma was mere moments from beating her previous solitaire high score when she heard frenetic knocking coming from behind the door. She quickly slammed down the lid of her laptop and pushed her swivel chair out from underneath the desk, watching as Liz did a similar thing albeit with her face more red and flustered. Emma straightened her blouse and composed herself before she clacked up to the door handle. She’d already prepared a whole host of excuses to use to explain her and Liz’s idleness but none were needed this occasion as a reasonably young lady in a fluorescent fuchsia bodycon dress burst into the room.

“Sorry ma’am, we don’t allow customers up...” Emma was beginning to say when the woman put her finger to her lips. She moved quickly yet cautiously, peeping out of the overlooking window before closing the shutters before proceeding to lock the door behind her and pull the latch across. “Excuse me, ma’am?” Emma’s voice tried to command confidence but squeaked midway as her knees trembled. Both Wilko employees were feeling helplessly terrified and crept towards the back of the room. The young lady seemed to notice and raised her arms in surrender, adjusting her glasses slightly as she did so.

“Please,” she said in a scintillating Polish-tinged accent, “Guys, you need to calm down.” That was maybe a bit too much to ask for from Liz who’d already moved beside the PA intercom and was about to press the button and holler for help. The woman tentatively took a step forward.

“Move an inch closer and I’ll have the whole store coming for you,” Liz hissed.

The woman stopped in her tracks, hands still raised in surrender. “Look guys, I know you’re probably a bit frightened right now but please, let me explain.” Though Liz was still sceptical, Emma nodded and motioned for her assistant manager to hold off for a second. The lady breathed a sigh of relief. “Thank you, Emma, honestly. I don’t want to think what would happen if anyone else found out about this. Look, I know this sounds far fetched and I know it’s hard to believe—God, I find it hard to believe myself.”

“Just hear me out. Alright... guys, it’s me, Steven.” Emma’s jaw dropped. Liz stumbled backwards slightly and looked at ‘Steven’ in shock.

“How the-... No way, it can’t be true...” Emma and Liz were both firmly entrenched in a shared state of disbelief. Aesthetically speaking it was clear this ‘woman’ wasn’t Steven; first off, of course, they were a woman. A woman with many feminine characteristics such as their slender build, supple legs and thighs with plump magenta lips, a cute button nose and thinly painted eyebrows. The lady’s clothes were also quite racy by Liz and Emma’s standards, hugging her curves tightly, barely covering the rim of her bulbous bum, and allowing the pert nipples of the woman’s bountiful D-cups to poke through the light material. Though her blonde-highlighted hair was cropped a bit short to one side and her arms were a bit more muscular than the managers were used to, this ofigure in front of them was unmistakably womanly. The only item that vaguely reminded Emma of Steven were the dorky looking spectacles placed in the bridge of her nose. They seemed oversized for her face and it seemed too out of place to be a stylistic choice.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f5/c1/b3/...

“How the...” Emma tried to find words to describe how she was feeling but no sound escaped her lips. Liz meanwhile strode up to her old friend and assessed him up close, pinching his soft cheeks and feeling his new breasts (much to Steven’s arousal) to verify if what they were seeing was real. Steven squealed girlishly as Liz took a firm grasp of his left nipple in her nails. “Ow, f*ck that hurt! What’re you doing, Liz?!” he screeched.

Liz grinned and turned back towards Emma. “Well we know she definitely whinges like Steven!” They all shared a chuckle and the ice growing between them had thawed and splintered partially. Emma gingerly stepped beside Steven and reached out, feeling soft flesh behind her finger. “Wow... It feels so real...” she mumbled to herself.

“It is real. I went to this car boot sale nearby my house, a weird thing for me to do in the first place and even weirder considering that I knew the person organising it was this whackjob old hag down the street. Anyways, I was just browsing through when I saw this amazing looking girl browsing through some old jewellery on display there. She’d picked up this beautiful golden teardrop earring with this strange glowing emerald inside and put it on but, for whatever reason, she couldn’t find the second one. Lo and behold I look down and see that the identical other half had rolled right beside my feet. Now I don’t what came over me but I got this really incessant urge to try it on, only for a second, and then I’d just take it off afterwards.”

“You put the earring on?” Emma asked incredulously.

“ ‘Beautiful teardrop earring’?” Liz asked, bewildered.

Steven blushed slightly and pushed a lock of hair behind his ear (a nervous idiosyncrasy he’d absentmindedly inherited from his host body). “There are layers to me that you don’t even know about, Liz,” he chuckled warily. “But don’t get me sidetracked! So basically I put on the earring for a second and BLAM! I’m on the other side of the display cabinet, inside the woman’s body and staring back at myself!”

“Holy moly,” Emma said, “That sounds so surreal, luv!”

“Did you get aroused by looking at yourself?” Liz chimed in before Emma punched her in the shoulder. “What?! I caught Courtney once writing one of those smut stories where this kind of sh*t happens! There’s always a perv that gets turned on by themselves! Am I right, Steven?” Steven blushed scarlet red once more. He cleared his throat brusquely and shook his head unconvincingly. “No, no way, pfft! Course not,” he fibbed, “That’s not the point of my story, alright! Let’s just say I was very confused and these new female hormones were screwing up with my head!”

“Before I could say anything the woman in my body strode over and dropped the other earring into my hand and left, just disappeared into the crowd, leaving me stranded with her body and these crappy bodyswapping pieces of junk!” Steven threw the earrings across the room with surprisingly strong force, sending them whizzing alarmingly close to Liz’s right ear. While Emma calmed him down, Liz ducked underneath her and Emma’s shared desk and picked up the antique trinkets. She marvelled at the ornate design, golden leaf patterns and strange inscriptions etched into the jewel’s surface.

“Careful, Steven! These could cost a fortune!” Liz snapped as she wiped off the dust that’d rubbed onto it with her blouse. Steven scoffed. “Please, those things are useless now. I tried putting them back on but nothing happened. Guess I’m stuck like this for the foreseeable future.” As he sighed dejectedly, Liz and Emma looked at each other and shared a knowing grin.

“Maybe you are, Steven,” Emma chuckled softly. “Maybe your new body and these weird artefacts are exactly what we need in order to show the area manager that we are diverse and we don’t discriminate against employees according to age!“

Steven seemed puzzled. “What are you on about? Did you not hear that I’m now stuck like this?!”

Liz was on the same thought track as Emma and quickly replied, “Yes, we heard that Steven and, though we offer you our deepest condolences, maybe this can actually lead to more pros for the branch than cons! Listen, corporate are starting to get on our backs. Apparently our workforce looks a bit too fresh-faced in their eyes and they’re worried that Rotherham’s showing biases towards younger people in the selection process. These earrings,” she said, lifting them in front of Steven’s bespectacled eyes, “May just be exactly what we need to prove them wrong!”

A few moments of silence passed, no-one inside the room saying anything at all. Then suddenly Steven burst out howling, slapping his knees and snorting in a cute way that would’ve sounded obnoxious back in his old body. He looked towards Liz and then onto Emma, both of their expressions rigid and stone-cold. “C’mon guys, you can’t honestly expect me to say that’s a good plan! Those stupid things don’t even work anymore and when they did, they screwed me over! I’ve still got my old crappy eyes right from before I swapped over! Even afterwards I must’ve put those damn earrings on and taken them off a dozen times!”

“Well you didn’t try it with someone else, did you? You might not be able to swap back to your old body anymore.”

Steven groaned as the realisation hit him. He trudged over to the desk and sat on the edge, splaying his legs out in a decidedly unladylike manner. “Even if you were to try an idea as stupid as that,” he whined, “How would you get anyone agree to give up their youth just for a stupid reason like this? There’s only one pair of these things so you’ll have to do all the swaps one at a time. It’s not feasible.”

Emma giggled as she took the golden earrings from Liz and juggled them inside her palm. “Don’t you worry your pretty little head, Stevie,” she laughed. “I can be very persuasive when I want to be.
1341.title: There is an unexpected knock at the door.

choices: Emma figures out a way to use the earrings to her immediate advantage
13415.content:
"First though we need to figure out how these things work." Emma said while she held up the earrings.

"I think that's kind of obvious." Steven said as he pointed at his new female body. "They make people swap bodies or at least they did before they stopped working."

Emma shook her head. "No, I think there is more to it than that. You didn't swap eyes and you got her accent. Why didn't that woman you swapped with, accuse you of stealing her body?" Steven shrugged. "I think we need to experiment." She opened the desk drawer and pulled out the notepad she usually carried when making her rounds. "I'll take notes." She looked over at Liz. "We'll need another person to swap with."

Liz leaned over towards the PA intercom. "Who did you have in mind Emma?" She asked. Emma smiled.

"Actually I was thinking of you, luv."

"Me?" Liz asked somewhat surprised. "What if I get stuck in Steven's body? What will Eric think when I tell him?" She was worried about her husband's reaction. Emma took another look at Steven's body.

"Oh I don't think he'd complain." She turned back to Liz. "Do you?" Liz looked at Steven herself.

"Well the boobs are a bit smaller but I don't think he'd have a problem with anything else on that body." She winked at Emma.

Steven stood up. "Who says I want to be in Liz's body?" He asked Emma. Before Emma could respond Liz butted in.

"What's wrong with my body? You'd still be younger than you were as a man." She poked one of his breasts with her finger. "Just remember, I've got three years on you sunshine." Steven scowled at her silently.

"Good," Said Emma whilst clasping her hands, "Now we've got that sorted out. Lets see if we can reproduce what happened originally." She unclasped her hands and handed an earring to Steven. "Put that on." Steven put it in his ear. She walked over to Liz who was taking her own earring out. "Okay Liz. You know what to do."

She handed Liz the earring. Liz was about to put it on when Emma stopped her. "Wait a second till I get my notepad." She leaned over to grab it.

"Hurry up Emma, for some reason, I really, really want to put this on." Liz was having to use all her willpower to stop herself.

"Hmm, just like Steven. Okay luv stop resisting." She started scribbling down notes. Liz put the earring on and everything in the office went a little fuzzy for a few seconds.

Liz looked at her hand and saw the other earring but it wasn't actually her hand. It was the hand of the young woman Steven had swapped with.

"Liz why did you just give Steven the earring?" Emma asked while leaning over her pad.

"I didn't, he did. We've swapped." Liz said with a slight Polish accent. She looked at Steven again. "And he's put his glasses on my head."

Emma and Steven in Liz's body, looked at Liz somewhat confused.

"That doesn't make sense." Emma said looking at both of them. "You are still in your own body Liz. Steven is in the body he got earlier."

"Yeah, it didn't work. I'm still stuck as this woman with these huge tits." Steven said looking down at Liz's large breasts while grabbing them.

Liz was getting frustrated. "Those are my tits, I mean breasts." Emma shook her head.

"Liz, luv we've worked together for years, I know what you look like." Liz was about to tell her Emma she was wrong again when she worked out what had happened.

"Your memories have changed." Liz told them. They both looked at her sceptically. "When Steven swapped at the car boot sale. That woman must have had her memories changed so she though Steven's body was her own. That's why she didn't accuse him of stealing her body." Emma scratched her head.

"Which would mean, the person who put the earring on second remembers but the first person doesn't." Emma said thinking it out. She leaned over and noted the discovery down.

"But that doesn't make sense either." Steven said as he put his hand on his hip.

"Why not?" Asked Liz in the young sexy body.

"If the earrings change our memories, how come you didn't recognise me when I turned up in this body," he thought about it for a few seconds then pointed at Liz, "that body I mean. This is bloody confusing."

"You're telling me, I'm the only one that remembers it right." Liz said as she sat her body back on the desk. She kept her legs together unlike Steven.

"I see what err, Steven is saying. Even though I find it hard to believe, that body was a stranger to us." Emma said.

"I see another problem." Liz said.

"What's that?" Emma asked.

"Our ages. If people's memories change, then I imagine the records will too and I'll still be thirty eight. It won't make any difference to the average age of the workers in the shop."

"I thought you were about twenty five?" Steven asked Liz, convinced her current body was her original.

"Oh the age goes with the body. That does help then." Liz said. She turned to Emma. "You better write that down Emma."

Emma wrote that down. "So how old are you Steven?" She asked.

"I'm forty one. I don't know how old this body is probably about the same, maybe a bit older." He said as he examined the back of his hands.

"Cheeky bugger, I just told you it's thirty eight because that's what I was before we swapped." An annoyed Liz told him as she stood back up again.

Emma had the top of the pen in her mouth as she thought about it. "Again Steven should think he's thirty eight but he still remembers being forty one. There must be something else we're missing." They all thought about it silently.

"I've got it!" Liz practically shouted. She put both earrings on. Everything seemed to go fuzzy again. "I remember Steven said he put the earrings on to try and change back. Did it work?"

"You've got my body now. We must have swapped again." He thought about it for a second moving his eyes from side to side. "No we haven't, have we?" Liz shook her head.

"You are just remembering the swap properly now." Liz said.

"So who is who?" A confused Emma asked.

"I'm Liz." Liz said from the young body. "Your memories aren't affected any more. I've swapped with Steven and you remember our original bodies."

"Yes, Steven has your body. Okay so that's what happens when the second person puts on the earrings, so what happens when the first person puts them on?" Liz took off the earrings and handed them to Steven. He put them in his ears.

"Has anything happened?" Steven asked.

"Not that I can tell." Emma said.

"Me neither." Liz confirmed.

"Typical." Steven said as he removed them. "They never seemed to do anything when I wear them."

"Hang on." Liz told him as she moved her sexy body towards him. "We've cleared out everyone's false memories, so maybe it does something else if the first person wears them before the second."

Emma nodded. "You'll have to swap back to find out."

"If we can." Steven said somewhat dejectedly. He handed Liz an earring. She put it in her ear. "Well here's hoping." Steven said as he put on the earring. Everything went fuzzy. Steven found the earring in his hand. He was back in his young sexy female twenty five year old body again. His glasses were back on his nose. After the previous swap he knew he was the person with the correct memories. He turned to Emma. "Let me guess. You think we haven't swapped?"

"Liz?" Emma asked. Steven shook his head. "Steven. That makes sense you were swapped before but now you must be back in your original bodies even if I remember that body as being Liz's"

"Okay." Steven said. "Liz was the first person to put on the earring, so she needs to put them on." He gave them to her and she put them on. Everything went fuzzy again.

"It just did what it did the last time." I remember I'm back in my original body.

"You are not." Emma told her. "As far as I remember that is Steven's body."

"Okay. It only affects me." Said Liz as she handed the earrings back to Steven. "Put them back on." Steven nodded. He put them back on and once again everything went a little fuzzy.

"Right, so you are back in your originally bodies?" Emma asked. Both Liz and Steven nodded.

Steven said "I can't believe I'm thinking of this as my original body. I was a man. It seems like such a distant memory."

"Oh don't be so melodramatic Steven." Liz told him as she rubbed his shoulder. "You're a pioneer. The first of many people who'll be getting swapped around here shortly."

Emma finished writing her notes. "I think I've got it all worked out. If one person each puts on an earring, they swap bodies mostly. The eyes stay with the mind they belong to. The first person to put on the earring and everyone else thinks there hasn't been a swap and their memories are adjusted. The first person gives their earring to the second person but doesn't remember doing it. The body's age seem to go with the body. The mind seems to think it is the age of the body. That could get weird if there is a big age difference."

"It's going to help us massively with the staffing issue though." Liz interjected. Emma nodded.

"Only the second person is unaffected by the change in memory. If the first person puts on both earrings they are the only person made aware of the swap. If the second person puts on both then everyone becomes aware. I think that's about it."

"Now what?" Steven asked Liz.

"Now, you are going to get changed into a company uniform. Don't think swapping bodies is going to allow you to get away with skiving off work."
13415.title: Something else happens (Reader’s Choice)

choices: Have a look at what else is going on in the store
There is the sound of approaching sirens
134151.content:
Liz disappeared out the office with Steven, leaving Emma on her own.

Normally she'd be back on her computer. Right now she was far too excited to play Solitaire. She wanted to make use of the earrings but she wasn't sure how.

She decided she needed a brief distraction and chose to touch up her make up. She opened her desk drawer and pulled out the vanity mirror she kept in there. As she applied the make up, she looked at her face. She didn't think of herself as old yet but she knew she wasn't young any more. She looked at the crows feet at the corners of her eyes and the few wrinkles around her mouth.

She ran her fingers through her dark hair. She had to dye it more regularly now to stop the grey creeping through. She thought about how much longer it took to get over an illness or a hangover for that matter. Emma suspected she had started to go through the early stages of the menopause, having the occasional hot flush. She felt like time was slowly catching up with her. "It would be great to be a young again." She said out loud to herself.

A wicked idea suddenly popped into her head. She put the mirror away. Emma pulled out her mobile phone and called her daughter Alice.

Alice was currently at home in the living room, sitting on the sofa, watching television and eating her breakfast. Her phone began ringing. "Hi mum. What's up?" She asked as she answered it.

"I was wondering if you could pop by work luv. I may have a lead on a job for you." Alice was currently 'looking' for a temporary summer job before starting university. She yawned in response.

"Yeah, I'll be there in couple of hours." She said sleepily.

"No, you need to come as soon as possible. The interview is today. I just found out about it." Emma lied.

"Oh okay."

"You should wear that outfit I got you."

"What the mini-me one?" She laughed at the derisory term she used for the outfit that resembled her mother's work clothes. It consisted of black trousers and a white blouse.

"It's professional." Emma insisted. Maybe it was a step too far she thought. She was starting to have doubts about this plan.

"Not exactly trendy though. I'm kind of in the middle of something right now anyway."

"I'm sure you can afford to miss an episode of This Morning." Emma told her referring to the daytime talk show.

"It's Homes Under the Hammer actually."

Emma sighed. "The point is you're wasting your whole day away doing nothing."

"It's just gone ten o'clock. That's hardly the whole day."

"And I've been up since seven." Emma really didn't want to get angry with her. The poor girl was just relaxing after finishing school. She couldn't blame her for that. Emma was starting to reconsider her whole plan. She calmed herself down. "There's more to life to sitting in your PJs, watching daytime TV and eating cornflakes."

"I'm not," Alice insisted, "it's Weetabix." This instantly angered Emma again.

"You know the Weetabix is mine." Emma was annoyed by the cheek of the girl, stealing it. This decided it for Emma. Her plan was going ahead.

"I fancied a change." Me as well, Emma thought.

"Well if you got a job you could buy your own bloody Weetabix." Emma told her in the well established tone of a parent. Alice mimicked her nagging silently. "And stop making faces." She told her after using her parental telepathy.

"Yes mum." Alice said with only the slightest hint of sarcasm. "I'll get the bus, should be there in about an hour or so."

"This is urgent. Get a taxi and wear the outfit." Emma changed to a sweet tone. "See you soon, luv you." She hung up.

---

Alice stepped into the manager's office just under an hour later. Emma who had been waiting impatiently, closed her computer and stood up to talk to her.

"Hi Honey." Emma said in a friendly manner as she looked at Alice in her business suit.

"I hope this job is worth it. I feel silly in these clothes." Alice told her as she looked at their nearly identical outfits. Emma frowned.

"Bad news I'm afraid. They already hired someone. One of their temps it seems."

"Oh great. All this effort for nothing." Alice said as she put down her hand bag on the desk. "You could have phoned. Where was it for?"

Emma thought of something on the spot. "Our store in Barnsley." Emma said in that unique way all people from Yorkshire say Barnsley.

"Sounds like I dodged a bullet. I'm glad I'm not going to Barnsley every day. Well, if I hurry back I might catch Bargain Hunt."

"No! Don't run off." Emma said pulling out the earrings. "I picked these up today. They are antiques. I thought you could tell me what you thought." She handed one to Alice. She looked at it.

"They are kind of pretty, I guess."

"Model it for me."

"My piercings have sealed up. I need them redone."

"I know luv. I think these earrings have a special attachment. Just try please." Emma insisted. Alice shrugged with her eyebrows and put the earring to her ear.

"Oh, wow. It does attach." Emma instantly felt the compulsion to put on the other earring. She didn't resist. Everything went fuzzy.

Emma looked down and saw the other earring in her hand. She looked up and found herself facing herself. It was such a strange sensation she could barely keep a straight face.

"What's so funny, mum?" Alice asked in Emma's middle-aged voice. She picked up her own handbag. Emma noticed, finding it interesting that the hand bag's ownership didn't swap.

"Nothing." She lied, in her new voice. She grabbed her own handbag and pulled out her purse. She noticed Alice's nails were unvarnished. She reached in and pulled out a twenty pound note. "This is for your taxis. Get yourself some lunch with change." Alice took the note.

"Thanks mum." Alice responded.

Emma sat down behind the desk and opened her computer. She looked up. "I'll see you later." She returned to looking at her computer indicating that the conversation was over. Alice turned round and walked out closing the door behind her.

Emma leaned back on her seat, in her new young body and smiled.
134151.title: Emma figures out a way to use the earrings to h...

choices: Stefania comes into the office.  She is not happy.
1341511.content:
"Time for a bit of an appraisal, I think." Emma said out loud. It still made her feel giddy talking in this new voice. She pulled her mirror out her drawer again. She spent several minutes examining her new face. She was familiar with it of course but she'd never seen it from this angle before.

She noted Alice's facial resemblance to her own. It seemed even more noticeable now. Many family members had commented on how much Alice looked like a younger version of her mother. In fact she clearly remembered someone using the word clone as a joke. That suited Emma just fine. If you were to get a younger body and you were generally happy with your looks surely you'd want some familiarity.

She found it quite difficult to tell if she had her original eyes. Like her facial features Alice's eye colour was similar to Emma's. On closer inspection though, she was fairly sure she had kept the originals. They just looked 'older'.

She spent quite a bit of time making faces in the mirror. She finished by pursing her lips several times and giggling each time.

She put the mirror down and ran her fingers through her hair. It felt silkier than her own. Emma was also aware it hadn't been damaged by years of dye treatment. In fact she couldn't remember Alice ever dying it. She didn't like her hair down though, especially when she was working. She reached into the drawer and pulled out her spare scrunchy. She quickly styled the hair into a pony tail. "Much better." She said to nobody again.

As she put the mirror back in the drawer, she spotted her handbag. As that hadn't swapped with Alice she was curious about the contents. She opened it. It seemed to be all her own stuff. She opened her purse and pulled out her driving licence. There on the pink piece of plastic was a photo of Alice with Emma's name next to it. She looked at the Date of Birth. It was the same as Alice's. As far as the world knew Emma was a few weeks shy of her eighteenth birthday.

She was even more surprised when she saw the date the licence was issued. It was eight years ago. "How the hell does that work?" Emma asked out loud. She wondered how a nine year old girl got a driving licence. It seemed the earrings could change more than just memories.

She put the licence away. She knew she had to investigate the age thing more but for now she wanted to inspect the rest of her body. She pulled out the chair and stood up. She would have preferred a full length mirror but she could kind of see a reflection in the office window.

She didn't mind posing in front of it. The old Tesco across the river had been demolished a few years ago. All that was visible was the Wilko store roof. She couldn't resist the urge to feel her own breasts. She cupped them in her hands. She was a little disappointed Alice's seemed a little smaller than her own. She wasn't complaining though, she'd gained thirty years in age.

As she moved around she felt a different sensation. It felt like her underwear was digging into her ass crack. She slipped her fingers down to free the rogue knickers when she suddenly stopped. "Am I wearing a thong?" She asked out loud after feeling the fabric. She had to see. She quickly pulled her hand out and unfastened the trousers letting them drop to her knees.

They did indeed reveal a very skimpy teal coloured thong underneath them. She couldn't recall ever seeing thongs in Alice's laundry. She would have had something to say about it, if she had. That wasn't her only surprise. There on her hip just below her non-existent waistband was a tattoo. It was a small red heart. "When the hell did she get that?" She asked both amazed and annoyed.

As much as she felt she had a certain level of control in Alice's life, she was quickly learning there was a lot more going on than she was aware of. She slowly pulled the trousers back up.

She finished fastening them, just as Liz walked in the door Emma had forgotten to lock. She silently cursed herself for getting distracted by the contents of her trousers. She put it out of her mind for now and returned to manager mode. "You all right Emma?" Liz asked as she fiddled with the printer.

"Oh yes. How are you getting on with Steven?" She asked.

"It's Stefania now. I came up to print his, I mean her, name badge." She said as she loaded the name badge blank into the printer.

"Did you get her sorted out with a new uniform?" Emma asked.

"Eventually," Liz sighed. "She is a total diva. She didn't like any of the underwear I got her. Reckoned the bras chaffed her too much. My bras chafe too but you don't hear me complaining about it."

"Well this is what happens when a man is in a woman's body. They complain about all the stuff we take for granted."

"I know." Liz said as she opened the badge template on her computer. "Anyway she ended up dressed. Our uniforms aren't designed for ladies with his proportions. He's quite the sight."

"I can imagine. So how are you explaining our new staff member?" Emma asked.

"Oh we're telling everyone Steven has gone on a course. We're going to say Stefania's a trainee assistant supervisor who is getting sent to a different store." Liz explained.

"Not Parkgate or Meadowhall?" A worried Emma asked, referring to the two nearby stores in the out-of-town shopping centres. "The staff know loads of people from there. They'll find out." Liz shook her head.

"Don't panic. Barnsley." She said as the badge started printing.

Emma sighed with relief. "Thank goodness. Our staff wouldn't know anyone from there."
